main event: A commercial pilot and a GOC observer spotted an extremely bright falling object for a period of 3-4 seconds.
interesting points: The object was observed at night under clear conditions., The GOC observer described the object as having red, yellow, and green colors., There was no aerial activity reported in the area at the time of the sighting., The initial report was delayed by 10 days., The report speculates that the object might be associated with astronomical phenomena, likely a meteor.
witness description: a commercial pilot and a GOC observer
